Method Detail

invoke

public java.lang.Object invoke(java.lang.Object proxy,
                               java.lang.reflect.Method m,
                               java.lang.Object[] args)
                        throws java.lang.Throwable
Invoke method is called by java reflection every time when any method is called on methos object. in this we wait untill we get reply from server and send received reply back to client application.

Specified by:
invoke in interface java.lang.reflect.InvocationHandler
Parameters:
proxy -
m - Method which is to be invoked on server
args - Arguments passed for method
Returns:
result from server after method invocation
Throws:
java.lang.Throwable - throws the exception thrwon due to method execution returned by server to client

getResult

public void getResult(java.lang.Object result)

methodTable

public void methodTable()
This method is used to make the method table of declared methods in interface extending ExternalGMIListener, so that if client try to invoke undefined method then we raise error message saying method is not defined.

getNameAndDescriptor

public static java.lang.String getNameAndDescriptor(java.lang.reflect.Method method)
This method return the method signature as string which is stored in table.

Parameters:
method - which is need to be stored in table
Returns:
signature of message to be stored in table

getTypeDescriptor

public static java.lang.String getTypeDescriptor(java.lang.Class type)
Get the descriptor of a particular type, as appropriate for either a parameter or return type in a method descriptor.
